cause.description:
The Blue Planet run is organizing the first ever run around the world to bring visibility and raise money for clean drinking water around the world. The run began on June 1st 2007 at the U.N in New York. 20 runners over the summer of 2007 will run 15,200 miles arond the world.
To date, the Blue Planet Run Foundation has already funded 130 water projects around the world.
www.blueplanetrun.org
1. Raise awareness and money for clean drinking water
